name: Virtual Defenders
description:
Practice in multiple space shooting simulations with Virtual Defenders! 

Virtual Defenders is a Roguelike 2D Shooter where you explore three space simulations, each with their own fleet of enemies that will try to take you down. Survive for 300 seconds to complete the simulation and clear the site!

  • Level up your ship by destroying enemy ships, empowering your engines, your shields and more!
  • Unlock up to 6 ships, each with their own advantages and disadvantages.
  • Take on a major challenge on Level 3, a hard mode site that includes enemies from all fleets!
  • Prepare to dodge, as enemies and bullets fill up the screen turning the space into a massive shooting field!
